terrapeer.vui.j3dui.control.actuators
Class AxisAnglePlugin

java.lang.Object
  terrapeer.vui.j3dui.control.actuators.TGGeometryPlugin
      terrapeer.vui.j3dui.control.actuators.AxisAnglePlugin
public class AxisAnglePlugin
extends TGGeometryPlugin

An geometry plugin that performs geometric rotation. Rotation occurs in 3D about an arbitrary axis defined relative to the target transform. The rotation axis is set by the actuation value.

Will not work properly with an SVTransformGroupPlugin. An M or MMTransformGroupPlugin must be used.

Also provides a set of utilities for converting between 3D and and actuation values.

The actuation input value is defined as follows:

  • X - X rotation axis value.
  • Y - Y rotation axis value.
  • Z - Z rotation axis value.
  • W - Rotation angle value in radians.
